特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
This course will be conducted mainly face-to-face, but some of the classes may be conducted online (simultaneous or on demand), depending on the coronavirus situation, and the pace of the course. Also, some on demand classes will be conducted as part of the COIL project.

For students who have permission to take this course online, the online course will be held in the following formats:
- simultaneous two-way online broadcast of face-to-face classes
- (if necessary) on-demand broadcast of data recorded from face-to-face classes

General course format:
Focus on content, grammar and vocabulary. Also, focus on tasks, group work, paragraph and essay writing, presentations. Students will be expected to complete their assignments in a timely manner before each class.

トピック.授業計画1: Please note that the weekly schedule above is for information purposes and may change throughout the semester. Any change will be announced to students in due time.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are expected to complete all the tasks assigned each week, in order to prepare for the class activities.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: 30% participation and completion of assignments; 20% COIL project; 30% Students as teachers project; 10% book reports; 10% essay writing

name: 【200】インテンシブ・イングリッシュ　３５／Intensive English
担当者: クセン　オアナ　Ｍ．（CUSEN OANA M.）
